scenario: AST SpaceMobile's stock fell 9.3% and Globalstar's market cap dropped 27% after news that SpaceX is partnering with T-Mobile US and Apple to expand its Starlink satellite internet service. Apple's latest iOS update contains code to support Starlink communications technology, potentially switching from Globalstar's satellites. This partnership, called "T-Mobile Starlink beta," has already started beta service with iPhone users on T-Mobile's network. AST SpaceMobile, which launched its first five operational BlueBird DTC satellites last summer, has yet to announce beta service. SpaceX has over 300 DTC satellites in orbit and has completed its "first orbital shell," giving it a significant lead in the direct-to-cell satellite communications space.
